name: Notion Daily Journal
description: Have a place to unwind every day with a Notion templateWant to start journaling daily? To have a place to write down all your thoughts and feelings?Use Notion Daily Journal to keep a track of what happened in your day. Write, reflect and learn more from your days.What you’ll get:a space for journalinga space to store daily moments and how they made you feelWith this Notion template, you’ll be able to have a moment to unwind and learn more from your days.FAQs:1. What is Notion?Notion is an all-in
features: a space for journaling; a space to store daily moments and how they made you feel
